name: Assemble the Team
text: Attached asset does not take up an Ally slot. [reaction] When an investigator plays an Ally asset at your location that costs less than the total number of allies in play and Assemble the Team is not attached to a card: That Ally enters play with Assemble the Team attached to it.

name: Beseeching Prayer
text:
[reaction] After a skill test ends, during which the original [eldersign] token was resolved, if this card is unexhausted: Seal ([eldersign]).

[reaction] When a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test at your location, exhaust Beseeching Prayer: Resolve the token sealed here, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then reveal another token.

name: Discarded Dogtags
text: [reaction] After an investigator at your location takes damage, exhaust Discarded Dogtags and deal it 1 damage: Gain 1 resource and heal 1 horror.

name: Close Quarters
text: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack and you may take 1 damage. If you succeed, this attack deals +1 damage (+2 if you took damage while resolving this card.)

name: Distribute Supplies
text:
Each investigator at your location may choose another investigator there and do 1 of the following - 

-  Spend 2 resources. Then, that investigator gains 3 resources.

-  Discard a card. Then, that investigator draws 1 card.

-  Discard 1 asset you control. Then, that investigator plays an asset. Reduce its cost by 1.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (3). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't, deal 1 damage to that enemy instead, and if they are non-Elite, exhaust them.

name: Absolute Focus
text: You get +1 to each of your skills during this skill test.

name: Insult
text: Fast. Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move 1 damage on it to this card. [reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 1 card and gain 2 resources.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [free] During the enemy phase, take an action as if it was your turn (this counts toward the number of actions you can take each turn and can provoke attacks of opportunity).

name: Rush to the scene
text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for a non-signature Firearm asset with Uses (X ammo). Play it, reducing it's cost by 2, with 1 ammo on it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (3). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't, deal 2 damage to that enemy and exhaust them instead.

name: "I'm too old for this..."
text: If this test is successful, heal 1 horror and draw 1 card. If you fail, heal 2 horror instead.

name: Security Guard
text: Uses (1 courage). You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you perform a fight action, exhaust Security Guard: Place 1 courage on Security Guard. [free] Spend 3 courage: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location. (Limit once per round.)

name: Hunt them Down
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Max once per round.
You may take an additional 4 actions this turn. At the beginning of next round, you lose 3 - X actions, where X is the number of actions you chose to not take last round (minimum 0).

name: Insult
text:
Fast. Choose an enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move up to 2 damage on it to this card.

[reaction] When the attached enemy attacks Insult's owner: It deals 1 less horror for this attack.

[reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 2 cards. Gain 2 resources for each damage on Insult.

name: "I'm Gonna Need a Bigger Gun."
text: You can only commit this card to a skill test you are performing on a Firearm asset. If you succeed, move all the ammo from that Firearm to this card. Discard that card and play a Firearm asset from you hand, reducing its cost by the cost of the card you discarded. Move all ammo from this card to the played Firearm.

name: Dave Reacher
text:
Handlocked.
While the leftmost player card in your hand is an event card: You get +1 [intellect]. Otherwise, you get +1 [willpower].

[free] Exhaust Dave Reacher: You may discard the leftmost card in your hand, then draw 1 card. Otherwise, move the leftmost card to the rightmost position of your hand.

name: Lab Coat
text:
Handlocked.

Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
[free] During a skill test you can commit to, exhaust Lab Coat: The current leftmost player card in your hand gains a [wild] icon during this test.

name: "Do as I do."
text:
Play after succeeding a skill test during your turn.
Choose another investigator at your location. They take an action with the same type as your last action. If they succeed a skill test, one of you gains 3 resources. If they fail a skill test, you may take an additional action this turn.

name: Eldritch Research
text: Take 1 horror. Discard the top 6 card of your deck. Add up to 2 cards discarded this way to your hand. Shuffle each weakness discarded by this effect back into your deck.

name: Following the Trail
text: Handlocked. While this card is the leftmost card in your hand, it gains fast. Move. Investigate. You may move to a connecting location. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation..

name: Glint From Afar
text:
Handlocked.
[reaction] After you move: Move Glint From Afar 1 position to the left in your hand.

Choose an investigator at your location. Move that investigator to a connecting location. Repeat this text for every 2 cards that were right of Glint From Afar right before it was played. (Limit 4 moves.)

name: Rampant Search
text: Investigate. Add your [combat] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, discard a card from you hand and draw 2 cards.

name: Snooping Around
text:
Fast. Play only at the end of the mythos phase.
Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and spawn it engaged with you. Attach Snooping Around to it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

[reaction] When an investigator defeats the attached enemy: You or that investigator heal 2 horror. They discover 1 clue at their location.

name: Mysterious Scriptures
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation (+3 [intellect] if you have 2 or more Insight cards in your hand). If you succeed, after this test ends you may play an Insight event from your hand other than Mysterious Scriptures, reducing its cost by 2.

flavor: "I just need to beat them at their own game."
name: Sinister Challenge
text: Reduce the cost to play Sinister Challenge by 1 for each event in your hand with a different name. Parley. Choose a Humanoid enemy at your location and test [intellect] (X), where X is the shroud of your current location. If you succeed, discover 1 clue from your location and a location with another enemy.

name: Seeing the Big Picture
text: Exceptional. Handlocked. [reaction] When you play an Insight card, move this card 1 position to the left: Reduce the cost of that card by 1.

name: Heather Freeman
text:
While you have 5 or more cards in your hand, you get +1 [intellect]. While you have 10 or more cards in your hand, you get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After you discard at least 1 card from your hand or deck, exhaust Heather Freeman: Draw 1 card. You may discard the card you drew, then draw 1 card.

name: Shroud of the Old Ones
text: [reaction] When a non-Elite enemy would spawn at your location, exhaust Shroud of the Old Ones and choose a connecting location with at least 1 clue on it: Test [intellect] (4). If you succeed, spawn that enemy at the chosen location instead, if able.

name: Timelocked
text: During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not draw cards. While you have no cards in your deck, you get +1 to each of your skills and may take an additional action during your turn. [reaction] After this card enters play: Discard your hand and draw 5 cards. Forced When a card effect would shuffle a non-weakness card into your deck, remove it from the game instead.

name: Bookkeeping
text:
If in your discard, there are at least...

- ...5 cards, you may draw 1 card.

<width semicondensed>- ...10 cards, your current location gets -2 shroud this round. </width>

- ...15 cards, discover 1 clue at your location.

- ...20 cards, discover 2 clues at any location.

Then, you may shuffle this card and your discard into your deck.

name: Tome of Memories
text: You get +2 skill value while resolving skill tests on event cards. [reaction] At the start of your turn, add an Insight card from your discard to your hand. At the end of your turn, remove that card from the game.

name: Inner Lining
text:
Handlocked. Uses (3 supplies).
[reaction] After you play a card in the left half of your hand, spend 1 supply and exhaust Inner Lining: Place 1 supply or ammo on another asset card you control.

name: Oddly Shaped Key
text: Fast. Limit 1 per deck. [action]: Investigate. If a +1, +0, or [eldersign] token is revealed during this test, attach Oddly Shaped Key to this location. Otherwise, return this card to your hand. (Max 1 test per location) [action]: If Oddly Shaped Key is attached to a location, discover 1 clue from that location.

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (3 supplies). Limit 15 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 supply on this card.

[action] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Discarded Evidence
text:
After playing Discarded Evidence, if you have an odd number of cards in your hand gain 2 resources and draw 1 card.

Otherwise, gain 3 resources. You may discard 1 card, then draw 1 card.

name: "Let Me See That!"
text: Use a [action] ability on an Item asset controlled by another investigator at your location, as if that asset was under your control. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If you succeed a skill test during the ability, you and the owner of the asset gains 1 resource.

name: The First to Flinch
text: Group limit 1 The First to Flinch in play. Fast. Play after you draw a non-weakness, non-peril treachery card, but before resolving that card's effects. Put The First to Flinch into play in your play area and attach that treachery to it instead of resolving it. Forced At the start of the mythos phase, an investigator draws the attached card. Then, discard The First to Flinch.

name: Unstable Terrain
text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evade. If you succeed, you deal the evaded enemy 1 damage.

name: "Who's counting?"
text: Fight. Perform a Fight action using a Weapon asset you control with no ammo remaining, as if it had 1 ammo. The attacked enemy gains retaliate for the duration of this skill test. If you succeed, place 1 ammo on the Weapon asset used.

name: Working the Angles
text:
Handlocked.
While Working the Angles in your hand or committed to a skill test, if it was/is in the left half of your hand, Working the Angles gains a [willpower] icon and "If this test is successful, draw 1 card."

name: Flawless Execution
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.	
If this test was on an event card and is successful: Gain X resources, where X is the cost of the event card when you played it.

name: The Klabb
text: Handlocked. Uses (4 ammo). If The Klabb was the leftmost card in your hand before playing it: Place 3 additional ammo on The Klabb. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack and you deal +1 damage. If you do not succeed by at least 1, remove 1 ammo from The Klabb.

name: Platinum Club
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for every 4 resources in your resource pool (Limit +5 [combat]). As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may exhaust Platinum Club. If you do, you deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (5 supplies). Limit 20 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 resource on this card.

[free] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: End of the Line
text: Handlocked. Fight. This attack deals +1 damage. If before playing End of the Line, right of it was at least... - ...2 cards, Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. - ...5 cards, this attack deals an additional +2 damage.

name: Royal Flush
text:
Handlocked. Fast. Play only during your turn.
<HS>
Royal Flush can only be played while it is the leftmost player card in your hand.
Draw 2 cards and you may take an additional 2 actions this turn. Remove Royal Flush from the game.

name: Underworld Couriers
text:
Handlocked. You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].
At the start of the round, the player cards currently in the leftmost and middle positions of your hand become the "Package", until they are played or the round ends.

[reaction] After you play a Package card: You may exhaust Underworld Couriers to draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

name: Celestial Inscriptions
text: [reaction] When when you would succeed a skill test, exhaust Celestial Inscriptions: You get +2 skill value for this skill test. Reveal another token.

name: Rending
text: Uses (3 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness event from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (2 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness asset from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Flickering Memories
text: Investigate. Reduce the cost to play Flickering Memories by 1 or add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location. If you succeed, Flickering Memories cost less than 2 resource to play, and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Recreation
text: Choose a card in your hand. Search the top 9 cards of your deck for up to 2 cards that share at least 1 trait with the chosen card, and draw them. Shuffle the chosen card into your deck.

name: Shockwave
text: Fight. Reduce the cost to play Shockwave by 1 or add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, this attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-Elite). If you succeed, Shockwave cost less than 2 resources to play, and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Old Ideas, New Methods
text: If you succeed and this skill test used your [willpower] in any way: Add Old Ideas, New Methods to your play area as an asset with the text: "You get +2 [willpower]. Forced At the start of your next turn: Discard Old Ideas, New Methods."

name: Infuse Strength
text:
Uses (2 Charges). If this card has no charges, discard it.

For the purpose of counting icons committed to your skill tests, [willpower] icons on your cards count as matching icons.
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test on an event card that does not use your [willpower] in any way, exhaust Infuse Strength: Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this test. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Infuse Strength.

flavor: "We can't run forever, but we can try."
name: Rewrite Fate
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Uses (3 charges). Attach to an Ally asset you control (limit 1 per ally). Attached asset gets +1 health. [free] Spend 1 charge and exhaust Rewrite Fate: Shuffle a non-weakness player card in your hand into your deck. Draw 1 card.

name: Bend Reality
text:
Myriad. Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to your location or a connecting location. Group limit 3 in play. 

[free] Move an investigator at your location to a location with a Bend Reality attached to it. Discard this card or spend 1 resource to shuffle Bend Reality into your deck.

name: Blessing From Beyond
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing. Max 1 committed per skill test.
If multiple chaos tokens are resolved during this skill test, you may return Blessing From Beyond to your hand after this test ends. (Canceled and ignored tokens are not resolved.)

name: Shackles of the Deep
text: Exceptional. While there is only 1 non-Elite enemy at your location, they cannot make attacks of opportunity. While you have at least 4 [combat], the ability below gains: "you get +4 skill value and deal +2 damage for this attack." [action] Fight. This attack uses your [willpower] instead of [combat].

name: Dale Briggs
text: You get +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After a Spell or Ritual asset you control leaves play, exhaust Dale Briggs: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Spell or Ritual card. Draw it or play it (paying it cost). Shuffle your deck.

name: Rending
text: Uses (4 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness event from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (3 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect].You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness asset from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Hand Wraps
text: Uses (3 grit). You get +1 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] When you would defeat an enemy that you dealt at least 1 damage to with a basic fight action this round, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wraps: Choose a level 0 Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Lucky Rabbit
text: [free] Discard Lucky Rabbit: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 9 cards of his or her deck for a Item card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

flavor: "Someone's gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] After your turn begins, choose and discard 1 card from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 1 resource.

name: Work Boots
text: Limit 1 Footwear per investigator. When an investigator at your location draws a non-peril Hazard treachery, you may draw it instead. [reaction] When you would be dealt damage and/or horror by a Hazard treachery, exhaust Work Boots: Reduced the damage or horror dealt by 1.

name: Mysteries of the Forest
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] during this skill test for each Creature card in your control and discard. If you succeed and have at least 3 total Creature cards in your control and discard, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Soul Searching
text: Investigate. This investigation uses your skill with the lowest base value, instead of [intellect]. Add the value of your skill with the second lowest base value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, you may heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy to a basic evade action. If you succeed, add Jumpy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [agility]. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Jumpy into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy to a basic investigate action. If you succeed, add Nosy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [intellect]. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Nosy into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy to a basic fight action. If you succeed, add Touchy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [combat]. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Touchy into your deck.

name: Survival Skills
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.

While Survival Skills is committed to a skill test, you get +2 to one of your skills with the lowest base value.

flavor: "Someone's gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] After your turn begins, choose and discard up to 2 cards from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 1 resource. If you discarded 2 cards this way, draw 1 card.

name: Follow Through
text: Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test by 3 or less while performing a basic fight action. Cancel that attack. Take a Fight action, targeting the same enemy. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Hand Wrap
text: Uses (4 grit). You get +2 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] When you would defeat an enemy that you dealt at least 1 damage to with a basic fight action this round, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wrap: Choose an Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy to a basic evade action. If you succeed, add Jumpy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [agility]. You may take an additional basic evade or move action during your turn. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Jumpy into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy to a basic investigate action. If you succeed, add Nosy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [intellect]. You may take an additional basic investigate action during your turn. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Nosy into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy to a basic fight action. If you succeed, add Touchy to your play area as an asset with the text (limit 1 per round): You get +1 [combat]. You may take an additional basic fight action during your turn. Forced At the end of the round, shuffle Touchy into your deck.

name: Goal Oriented
text:
This card is also a [seeker] level 0 card.
If this skill test is successful during an investigate, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 clue.

If this skill test is successful during an attack, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 enemy.

name: Shattered Timepiece
text: Exceptional. Uses (2 charges). [reaction] After a Non-Elite enemy enters your location, exhaust Shattered Timepiece: That enemy enters your location exhausted or place 1 charge on Shattered Timepiece. [free] Spend 1 charge: Choose an investigator or Non-Elite enemy at your location. Move them to a connecting location.

name: Look to the Stars
text:
This card is also a level 2 ([survivor]) card.
Fast. Play when an investigator would fail a skill test. That investigator gets +3 skill value for this test (+5 if it was a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token). Reveal another token. If this skill test fails, return Look to the Stars to your hand. (Limit 1 Look to the Stars per test.)

name: Mask of the Forgotten
text: Limit 1 Mask in play. [reaction] When you target an enemy with a player card effect or ability: That enemy gains the Monster and Humanoid traits, if they didn't already have them, for the duration of the effect or ability.

name: Ring of Desire
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] After Ring of Desire enters play and after your turn begins, choose one of your skills with the lowest skill value: Increase the base value of that skill by 1 until the start of your next turn. (Limit once per round.)

name: Calm the Nerves
text:
If there is a copy of Calm the Nerves in your discard, Calm the Nerves gains [wild] [wild].
Choose an investigator at your location. They heal 1 horror.

name: Life Experience
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

You may commit Life Experience to any type of test.</width>
You get +1 to each of your skills for this skill test. 

If this test is successful and a second skill's value was added the your skill value this test: Draw 1 card.

name: Circlet of Sealing
text: During the enemy phase, enemies at your location have -1 fight and -1 evade.

name: Essence of Humanity
text:
This card can only be purchased by 1 investigator once per campaign.
When the owner of this card would take any amount of trauma, cancel 1 of it and exile Essence of Humanity.

flavor: "I can feel them crawling under my skin!"
name: Delusional Parasitosis
text: Revelation Place Delusional Parasitosis into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If there are no other investigators at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Delusional Parasitosis.

name: Overshadowed
text: Revelation Place Overshadowed into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If an enemy is at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Overshadowed.

name: Sword of the Last Crusader
text: [action] Fight. For this attack, you may use [willpower] instead of [combat]. you get +2 skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. Any investigator may choose to use the following effect instead of their [eldersign] token's normal effect: +2. After this test ends, the owner of this card may take an immediate action, which can only be used to fight (limit once per round).

flavor: "Everything has a weakness if you look hard enough. It's usually being set on fire."
name: Leyline Reading
text: Evade. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evasion. If you succeed, Add Leyline Reading to your play area as an asset with the text: Limit 1 per investigator. [free]: Shuffle Leyline Reading into your deck. Reduce the cost of the next Spell card you play this turn by 2.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If your last action you performed this turn was a basic fight or evade action, this attack deals +1 damage.

name: Down to Earth
text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] After you succeed a skill test during a basic action that you committed at least 1 skill to, exhaust Down to Earth: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for an Innate skill and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: The Final Flame
text: [reaction] After you shuffle at least 1 card from your hand, discard, or play area into your deck: Place 1 resource ( from the token pool ) on The Final Flame, as kindling. While The Final Flame has at least 5 kindling on it: Reduce the cost of cards you play by 1.

name: Breaking your Limits
text:
Fast. Play only durng your turn. (Max 1 per round.)

Take 2 direct damage and horror. Then, engage any number of enemies at your location and raise the base value of your [combat] and [agility] to 6 this round. You may ignore attacks of opportunity this round.

During the enemy phase, when an enemy would attack you, you may immediately take a fight or evade action first.

name: Repossession Contract
text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced After Repossession Contract enter play: Search your bonded cards for Prowler and put it into play. When Repossession Contract leaves play, remove Prowler and Shadowfoot from the game (even if they are out of play).

name: Prowler
text: Bonded (Repossession Contract). Uses (0 loot). [reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 1 or more : Place 1 loot on Prowler. Forced After the second loot is placed on Prowler: Move all loot to your resource pool, as resources. Search your bonded cards for Shadowfoot and put it into play. Remove Prowler from the game.

name: Shadowfoot
text: Bonded (Repossession Contract). Uses (0 loot). [reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 2 or more: Place 1 loot on Shadowfoot. Forced After the third loot is placed on Shadowfoot: Draw 1 card and move all loot to your resource pool, as resources. Search your bonded cards for Master Thief and put it into play. Remove Shadowfoot from the game.

name: Master Thief
text:
Bonded (Repossession Contract). Master Thief cannot be discarded.
You get +1 skill value while investigating and evading.

[reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 3 or more, exhaust Master Thief: Gain 1 resources and draw 1 card.

name: Cautious
text:
You may play the card attached to Cautious as if it were in your hand.
[free] If there is not a card attached to Cautious, exhaust Cautious: Attach 1 non-weakness player card from your hand to Cautious.

name: Undercover Agent
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Undercover Agent enters play: You get +2 [combat] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After you defeat an enemy with at least 3 health, discard Undercover Agent: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Unlicensed "Surgeon"
text: Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [reaction] After Unlicensed "Surgeon" enters play: You get +2 [intellect] until the end of the round. [reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Unlicensed "Surgeon": Heal 1 damage or horror from an investigator or Ally asset at your location.

name: Underworld Assasin
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Underworld Assasin enters play: You get
 +2 [agility] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Underworld Assasin: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Wayward Pilgrim
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Wayward Pilgrim enters play: You get +2 [willpower] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Wayward Pilgrim: Place 1 charge on an asset you control.

name: Ship Captain
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Ship Captain enters play: Move to a connecting location.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Ship Captain: Move an investigator at a connecting location to your location.

name: Agent of the Order
text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] When you play Agent of the Order, if an enemy at your location has exactly 1 remaining health: Deal 1 damage to that enemy and Agent of the Order gains fast.

[reaction] After you fail an attack by 2 or less, exhaust Agent of the Order: You get +1 [agility] this round. You may immediately take an evade action.

flavor:
"Even people like us can make a 
difference if we put of life on the line."
name: The Damned
text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location initiates a skill test, deal 1 damage or horror to The Damned: Reduce the difficulty of that test by 2.

[reaction] After your turn ends: Heal 1 damage or horror from The Damned.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If your last action you took this turn was a basic fight or evade action, this attack deals +1 damage. If you fail, you may exhaust hatchet, then take a basic fight or evade action.

name: Rending
text: Uses (3 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness event from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (2 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to shuffle it into your deck. [action] Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect].You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, shuffle 1 non-weakness asset from your hand into your deck. After this test ends, spend 1 charge.

name: Brute Force
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
While Brute Force is committed during a basic fight action, it gains [combat] and the text: "If this test is successful by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage."

name: Faithful
text: If this test would be successful, reveal 5 additional tokens from the chaos bag. Cancel all chaos tokens revealed this way that are not a [eldersign] token.

name: Infuse Strength
text:
Uses (3 Charges). If this card has no charges, discard it.

For the purpose of counting icons committed to your skill tests, [willpower] icons on your cards count as matching icons.
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test on an event card that does not use your [willpower] in any way, exhaust Infuse Strength or spend 1 charge: Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this test. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Infuse Strength.

name: Faithful
text: If this test would be successful, reveal 10 additional tokens from the chaos bag. Cancel all chaos tokens revealed this way that are not a [eldersign] token. If an [eldersign] token was not revealed this way, draw 1 card.

flavor: "It is said that they put their very soul into that strike. In the light that followed, the world escaped a terrible fate, and lost its greatest hero."
name: The Strike to end an Age
text: Exceptional. Fight. Resolve a Fight action on a Melee asset you control, ignoring it's [action] cost. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to each enemy at your location. If at least 1 enemy is defeated during this attack, return a Blessed card from your discard to your hand.

flavor: "Not a single soul survived that battlefield, but their resolve has never wavered. They will push back the darkness with everything they once had."
name: Souls of the Forgotten
text: Exceptional. Fight. This attack targets the enemy in play with the highest fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +4 damage. If you would succeed, reveal the [eldersign] token and apply it's effect.

name: Fixer
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. 

During your next action, set the base value of one of your skills to 4 and you ignore attacks of opportunity.

[reaction] When you play Fixer, increase its cost by 2: Change "your skills to 4" to "your skills to 7".

[reaction] When you play Fixer, increase its cost by 2: Change "your next action," to "this turn,"

name: Rendezvous
text: Move: Move 1 investigator at your location to a revealed location up to 3 connections away. [reaction] When you play Rendezvous, increase its cost by 2: Change "Move 1 investigator" to "Move 2 investigators". [reaction] When you play Rendezvous, increase its cost by 2: Change "up to 3 connections away" to "up to 5 connections away".

name: Crackdown
text:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

[reaction] When you play Crackdown, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 2 damage" to "Deal 3 damage."

[reaction] When you play Crackdown, increase its cost by 2: Change "an enemy at your location." to "each enemy at your location."

name: Scouting Network
text: Fast. Play when a non-Elite enemy spawns at your location. The enemy spawns at the same location as you instead, exhausted. [reaction] When you play Scouting Network, increase its cost by 2. Change "exhausted." to "with 2 damage on it." [reaction] When you play Scouting Network, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at any location".

name: (Deprecated) Distraction
text: Forced When you draw (Deprecated) Distraction, add it to the hand of another investigator, if possible. Play only if the owner on this card is at your location. The owner of this card performs an evade action. For this evasion they may use your base [agility] instead of theirs. If they succeed, you may perform a move action.

name: (Deprecated) Clear a Path
text: Forced When you draw (Deprecated) Clear a Path, add it to the hand of another investigator, if possible. Play only if the owner on this card is at your location. Move to a connecting location. You may swap places with the owner of this card. If you do, gain 1 resource.

name: (Deprecated) Cover Retreat
text: Forced When you draw (Deprecated) Cover Retreat, add it to the hand of another investigator, if possible. The owner of this card moves 1 location along the shortest path toward your location. If they enter your location this way, either engage an enemy engaged with them or draw a card.

name: Search Party
text: Fast. Reduced the cost of Search Party by 1 for each Acquaintance asset you control. Choose up to 2 Acquaintance assets in your discard pile. Return the chosen cards to your hand. You may put an Acquaintance asset into play.

name: Lenora Howard
text: Fast. You get +1 [combat] and +1 [agility]. [free] During your turn, exhaust Lenora Howard: Return an Ally asset at your location other than Lenora Howard to its owner's hand. Then, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to fight or evade.

name: Following the Script
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.Max 1 committed per skill test.

You may commit Following the Script to any type of test.

When this skill test would succeed, resolve the [eldersign] effect on your investigator card. Then. remove this card from the game.
